description.narrative: Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations - CEPI - is not-for-profit and works to ensure a fair access to vaccines, surmountable prices and availability in areas that are most affected by new and emerging diseases – in particular low income countries. CEPI works in close partnership with WHO and the World Bank and has become one of the lead actors on vaccine development – both in regards to preparedness, but also to response and immediate needs such as the COVID-19 pandemic – and has the institutional expertise, networks, and agility to move rapidly.
